name: Monster Adventure Mission
description:
Enter in monster jungle and and enjoy the adventure of monster sniper jungle hunting. You will have to clear monsters island and beasts island. This is the best monster simulator game.
In monsters island monsters will attack at you kill them and survive yourself form monsters island.When you will pass in fantasy beasts island in beasts island you will have to do more care because beasts are more dangerous.
So clear monsters island and beasts islands and make yourself a survival hero and make your adventure on this island.

Features
Best 3D dangerous environments.
Strong controls in FPS movements very smooth touch
Best artificial intelligence never been provided in 3D shooting game
Different feelings in different levels
Scary background music and other sounds
